question:
Match the List-I with List-II in the following

| List-I (Monomer) | List-II (Polymer Unit) |
|---|---|
| 1. Caprolactum | a. <katex>$-(CH_2-CH(C_6H_5))-$</katex> (Polystyrene structure) |
| 2. Vinyl chloride | b. <katex>$-(CH_2-CH(CH_3))-$</katex> (Polypropene structure) |
| 3. Styrene | c. <katex>$-(CH_2-CH(Cl))-$</katex> (PVC structure) |
| 4. Propene | d. <katex>$-(NH-(CH_2)_5-CO)-$</katex> (Nylon-6 structure) |
